game.title: Dragon Hunt
game.description: You have been tasked to defeat the fire-breathing dragon that has been terrorizing the village. Use your skills and cunning to conquer the dragon and restore peace to the kingdom.

task.description: Begin your journey by traversing the perilous Dark Forest, crossing the Golden River, and scaling the treacherous Deathly Mountains to locate the dragon's lair.
Once inside the lair, face and defeat the fierce fire-breathing creature to bring an end to its reign of terror.
